context.content: "Whatever Works" is a romantic comedy film directed by Woody Allen. The story follows a quirky, pessimistic New Yorker who forms an unlikely bond with a young, naive runaway from the South. The main characters are played by Larry David and Evan Rachel Wood. The film explores themes of love, relationships, and the unexpected connections that can change our lives.
